Here’s The Most Popular Female Idols Among Korean Lesbian Women

Recently, Korean lesbian, bisexual, and pansexual women all got together and voted for their top 100 favorite girl idols. A grand total of 4,118 women participated and a whopping 17,860 votes were cast. The results are finally in and the top 25 from the list may surprise you!

1. Seulgi (Red Velvet)

3 keywords Seulgi searched on the internet!

#1 Thai Massage

“I searched for thai massage and went for it. I got it yesterday and I feel refreshed so I feel really good.”

æˆ‘æŒ‰æ‘©é«˜æ‰‹ Seulgiå¯ä»¥callæˆ‘

#2 Interior

“I heard we’re moving to a new dorm so I searched for interior. I was about to buy a bed but these days it’s pretty to only use a mattress. Mattress, cushion, blanket. I’m planning on buying nice things. If Seulgi’s able to decorate her new room, she would decorate it just like the one in the picture she showed!”

#3 Bob Hair

“I think a lot about hairstyles. This time, I wanna try something different so I searched for bob hair a lot. There are ppl who stopped me but also ppl who told me to go for it. So pls pay attention to how it’ll change.”
